DOC.brief_title: MS 209 Plus Docetaxel Treating Patients With Advanced Solid Tumors
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine maximum tolerate dose oral MS-209 give docetaxel IV patient advance solid malignant tumor . - Assess toxicity regimen patient . OUTLINE : This dose escalation , multicenter study MS-209 . Patients receive docetaxel IV 1 hour day 1 3 week course . On day 1 2nd course , patient receive MS-209 orally follow docetaxel IV 1 hour . Treatment repeat every 3 week 4-7 course ( include course docetaxel alone ) . Treatment continue absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Cohorts 3-6 patient receive escalate dos MS-209 maximum tolerate dose ( MTD ) determine . The MTD define dose 2 3 3 6 patient experience dose limit toxicity . Patients follow every 6 week . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : Approximately 3-30 patient accrue study .
